title: Nic Carter | Layer Zero
description:
Nic Carter is one of our favorite writers in crypto. He's shaped our thoughts on many subjects over the years. He's definitely a Bitcoiner, but is he also an Etherean? What makes Nic tick?

Get to know the person behind the persona in this week's episode of Layer Zero.
